meanings.sent1: The huskier man easily lifted the heavy boxes.

meanings.definition: Covered with a dry, outer layer
meanings.sent1: The huskier corn cobs were left out to dry in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The huskier leaves rustled in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent3: The huskier coconut was cracked open to reveal the juicy fruit inside.

meanings.sent5: The huskier seeds were scattered by the wind, leaving behind the empty shells.

meanings.definition: To speak in a deep, rough voice
meanings.sent1: He huskiered his way through the scary story to make it more dramatic.
meanings.sent2: The old sailor huskiered his tales of the high seas to captivate the audience.
